SEARCH
Package menufact

Class Chef

java.lang.Object
menufact.Chef
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class Chef extends Object implements Observer
The Chef class represents a chef who is responsible for preparing dishes in a restaurant. It implements the Observer interface to receive notifications when an ingredient is out of stock.
